resources.string: To begin, click on the authentication text message you have been sent by Centre for Dentistry
if you have not received text message, or you are not yet a registered CFD patient, please click here to contact the Patient Care Team and they will sent it to you
You should have received an introductory text or email from CFD
Please click on the link in that text. if you have not already,you will then receive an Authentication text so you can login
find an available slot at one of our Practices and book yourself in
Any past or future appointments that have already been booked
When you refer a friend or family member to us at CFD. We like to say thank you. Refer friend to quality for 10% of your next visit. As the CFD family grows so does your reward.

Our Amual Dental plan offers you a cost effective way to help look after you teeth and prevent problems from building up. The Dental plan is designed to help you plan for your oral health over time so we can look after you and your smile.

A year\'s membership to the CFD annual dental plan entities you to:
Routine Dental Check-Ups
Routine scale and Polish Appointments
Considerable Cost Savings
10% off most dental treatments
Discounts on dental care products for our plan members
Free Check-Up and Flouride Application for children
Caution - This will remove all personal information from this app and reset it to the original state. You will need to contact the CFD again to associate with your data.
